my_favourite_bni_story: My initial connection to BNI was serendipitous: I was a member of a local club where a BNI chapter held its weekly meetings. For a business focused on international export and strategic partnerships, the idea of a structured, supportive network focused on referral excellence resonated deeply with my business values. My decision to join was driven by the recognition that trust-based, structured networking is the most powerful path to sustainable business expansion, which is why I'm here today
